name: 数据的分离和查询 -- @2.1 数据的制造和查询

steps.name: Given 用例编号数据分离003和用例描述指令数据分离: 指令下发和查询

When 数据制造: 接口{"接口名": "指令下发", "请求方法": "POST", "url": r"/aiot-device/v1/mac/api/kas/dispatch-tasks"}, api账号{"api_key": "ugp1zdjvhfsht16a", "api_secret": "0eb9trdq29yj8q7ruc0nrokm4obstd7s"}, 请求参数[{"tag": "展示时长设置2秒", "deviceId": "0120100016c0aa02a00", "deviceName": "设备002", "name": "展示时长设置的指令", "instruction": "2002", "instruParams": {"time": 2}, "sendType": "http"}], 期望值{"code": 200, "msg": "指令下发成功"}

Then 数据查询: 接口{"接口名": "指令查询", "请求方法": "GET", "url": r"/aiot-device/v1/mac/api/kas/find-tasks-status"}, 本api账号, 请求参数{"tag": "展示时长设置2秒", "deviceId": "0120100016c0aa02a00", "status": "CREATED", "current": 1, "size": None, "taskId": ""}, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "指令列表查询成功", "totalCount": 1}
Then 同空间异api账号{"api_key": "98h35f4e50xoe6m4", "api_secret": "k30oyz58fb7j0sfx4iaqa8n0s3vmiivj"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "指令列表查询成功", "totalCount": 1}
Then 同租户异空间的api账号{"api_key": "150qw761lcolwssc", "api_secret": "b9vrjzvg1dorejp1d4rw1ad7rr3mknx8"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "指令列表查询成功", "totalCount": 0}
Then 异租户的api账号{"api_key": "uafpktjevv9pebcl", "api_secret": "nvs1gb3lct3fxy4ji4xzarxs7zt3nwxc"}查询: 参数同上, 预期{"code": 200, "msg": "指令列表查询成功", "totalCount": 0}

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: 指令数据分离: 指令下发和查询

parameters.name: parameter1
parameters.value: [{"tag": "展示时长设置2秒", "deviceId": "0120100016c0aa02a00", "deviceName": "设备002", "name": "展示时长设置的指令", "instruction": "2002", "instruParams": {"time": 2}, "sendType": "http"}]

fullName: 数据查询和数据分离: 数据的分离和查询
